hmstr_character.character_desc: Marta is the kind-hearted hamster who loves helping others and always has a warn smile for everyone
Homie is the loyal freind who enjoys spending time with his buddies and always knows how to make everyone feel at home
Fightly is full of energy and enthusiasm, always up for a fun adventure or a new game with freinds
Rockstar loves music and is always ready to play a tune or sing a song to lift everyone's spirits
Fanky is the life of the party, bringing joy and laughter with flunky dance moves and a great sense of humor
